Don't forget! We're hosting a webinar series for PSEG customers and would like to remind you that one of the webinars is tonight. Learn why so many PSEG customers have already gone solar and how solar could dramatically shave your PSEG bill. Have you reserved your spot?
#2: Change Your World, One Panel at a Time <http://directenergysolar.omnovia.com/register/36811447171025> TONIGHT, December 2nd, 7–7:30 PM The impact a rooftop solar system could have on the environment here in New Jersey, our energy independence, and your family’s home.
Meet your local solar team at Direct Energy Solar and learn the latest on solar in our market.
WHAT YOU’LL LEARN: • How solar saves you money on your energy costs • What drives your cost of solar, and how much you may save • Local incentives that help you save even more • Why you need to decide soon, before the 30% federal tax credit expires • No-money-down financing, purchase, and lease options—which are right for you?
RSVP to Reserve Your Spot: <http://directenergysolar.omnovia.com/register/36811447171025>
Upcoming Webinars as Part of This Series
DECEMBER 8TH, 7–7:30PM #3: Understanding the Solar Fine Print <http://directenergysolar.omnovia.com/register/62981447171959> Everything you need to know about Central New Jersey’s solar permitting, contracts, community pricing, SRECs, net metering, guarantees, and warranties—before you choose the installer who will support your system for decades to come.
DECEMBER 16TH, 7–7:30 PM #4: Renewable Energy’s Perfect Storm <http://directenergysolar.omnovia.com/register/19361447172058> Understand how energy market trends finally turned the tide from centuries of burning fossil fuels to Central New Jersey’s mass adoption of today’s affordable renewable.
Contact Us: 800-903-6130 Your Sun. Your Power. Your Way.
